meta_description: Explore the GRAMMY Museum in LA with interactive exhibits and exclusive collections. Discover the stories behind music's greatest artists and their impact.
hours_text:
## Make the Most   
of Your Visit 

We have all the information you’ll need to **plan your visit**. Get directions, parking details, and exhibit information so that you can **experience all we have to offer**.

Sunday-Monday

11:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Tuesday

Closed

Wednesday-Friday

11:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Saturday

10:00 AM - 6:00 PM

[ Museum Tickets  ](https://tickets.grammymuseum.org/event/grammy-museum-admission)

Adults 

$22.50 

Seniors 

$18 

Ages 65+ 

Students 

$15 

Age 18+, Valid ID Required 

Youth 

Free 

Ages 0-17. *Visitors under 16 must be accompanied by an adult. 

Military 

$18 

Valid ID Required 

Member Guest 

$15 

Groups 

[ Buy Group Tickets ](/visit/group-tours/)

When booked in advance, groups of 10 or more qualify for discounted ticket prices. Please note, all school groups and large groups must be booked in advance. Walk-ins or unannounced group visits cannot be guaranteed accommodation due to capacity limitations. Please contact our Group Sales Team at [groups@grammymuseum.org](mailto:groups@grammymuseum.org) or use our [online booking form](/visit/group-tours/) to reserve your visit. 

## Mike Curb   
Cafe 

Visit the Mike Curb Cafe located on The Ray Charles Terrace for a variety of grab-and-go options, including vegetarian and kid-friendly items. Enjoy stunning city views while sipping on cappuccinos or snacking on delicious food crafted by Wolfgang Puck Catering. Our menu changes seasonally to ensure fresh and exciting choices for all visitors...

From Texas To The World
